items.sentence: Tom started studying French when he was a kid, so his pronunciation is very good.
Tom wouldn\'t have been able to get his homework done if Mary hadn\'t helped him.
Tom hasn\'t yet heard anything definite about whether he got into Harvard or not.
We got this chair for nothing because the lady next door didn\'t need it anymore.
Tom says he told the police officer that he was just there to take some pictures.
Tom is very busy every afternoon, but he often has some free time in the morning.
Tom decided it wasn\'t really necessary to deal with that problem this afternoon.
I couldn't but sympathize with the girl who had lost her parents in the accident.
I'm glad that I wasn't the one who had to tell Tom that his wife had been killed.
I spent the whole morning with you, so I'm going to spend the afternoon with Tom.
